title: I want to down grade to android 10. My pixel 4 a became crappy aftrr android 11 upgrade. Wandering
content:
After upgrading to android 11 my pixel 4a became crappy .
I want to downgrade to android 10.
Or return my device.
I am very unhappy with android 11.
Hope pixel 4a 5g can handle android 11 without becoming a primitive device as pixel 4 a did
